actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to Subcommittee on Agricultural Production.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Agricultural Production and Stabilization of Prices

official_title: A bill to clarify a provision of the Disaster Assistance Act of 1989 in order to avoid penalizing producers who planted a replacement crop on disaster-affected acreage, and for other purposes.
short_title: Disaster Assistance Fairness and Equity Act of 1989

summary.text: Disaster Assistance Fairness and Equity Act of 1989 - Amends the Disaster Assistance Act of 1989 to specify that the "net value" rather than the "value" of any replacement crop shall be considered when making specified disaster payment reductions.

titles.title: Disaster Assistance Fairness and Equity Act of 1989
A bill to clarify a provision of the Disaster Assistance Act of 1989 in order to avoid penalizing producers who planted a replacement crop on disaster-affected acreage, and for other purposes.
